message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $1,400,000.  It's a great opportunity for you and a fair price considering its value. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,250,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $1,250,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $1,350,000.  This is still a great price for you, and it gives me some room to make this work. Let's try to find a middle ground.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $1,300,000. I think this is a fair price for both of us.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $1,300,000 is still a bit lower than what I need to make this work. How about we settle on $1,325,000?  It's a compromise that respects both our needs.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $1,312,500. I think this is as close as I can get to your price without going over my budget.

Bob,  I appreciate your continued efforts to find a solution.  I'm willing to come down to $1,318,750.  This is a very small adjustment from your last offer, and it's the closest I can go without losing too much on this deal. Let's see if we can finally close this.

I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $1,307,500. I think this is as close as I can get to your price without going over my budget.
